alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GREENWOOD COUNTY UNTIL 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 13 miles south of Abbeville, or over Troy, moving southeast at 10 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Troy and Bradley. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
